headline: SLB (SLB): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Momentum and Digital Expansion Strategy
summary: SLB (SLB) shares have moved just slightly following a quiet period in news flow. This gives investors an opportunity to focus on recent price trends and the company's value profile. Over the past month, shares are up 10%. See our latest analysis for SLB. After a choppy start to the year, SLB’s 1-month share price return of 10.5% hints at momentum building again, even with the stock still lagging on a -13.9% total shareholder return over the past 12 months. It is a reminder that trends can...
